name: TC-PROFILE-01: Get user profile with valid token
description: Retrieve logged-in user profile using valid Bearer token

name: TC-PROFILE-02: Get profile without token
description: Attempt to access profile without authentication token

name: TC-PROFILE-03: Get profile with invalid token
description: Access profile with malformed or invalid token

name: TC-PROFILE-04: Get profile with expired token
description: Access profile with expired authentication token

name: TC-PROFILE-05: Verify profile email field
description: Ensure email field exists and has correct format

name: TC-PROFILE-06: Verify profile fullName field
description: Ensure fullName field exists and is not empty

name: TC-PROFILE-07: Verify profile avatarUrl field
description: Ensure avatarUrl field exists in response

name: TC-PROFILE-08: Verify profile status field
description: Ensure status field exists in user profile

name: TC-PROFILE-09: Get profile with empty Bearer token
description: Access profile with Bearer keyword but no token value

name: TC-PROFILE-10: Get profile without Bearer keyword
TC-PROFILE-11: Verify complete profile data structure
description: Validate all required fields are present in profile response

name: TC-PROFILE-12: Get profile with token in query parameter
description: Attempt to send token as query parameter instead of header

name: TC-PROFILE-13: Get profile with malformed Authorization header
description: Send Authorization header with incorrect format

name: TC-PROFILE-14: Verify profile response status field
description: Ensure response has status field with 'success' value

name: TC-PROFILE-15: Get profile with case-sensitive token
